intro: Kotschya africana var. latifoliola, commonly known as the African kotschya, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its broad, lance-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white or pinkish flowers.
